# Irish Tax Agents vCard Web App

## Project Overview
This is a Vite-powered digital business card application with admin editing capabilities.

## Key Files
- `src/main.js` - Main application logic and UI rendering
- `src/data.js` - Contact data management and authentication
- `src/vcard.js` - vCard generation and sharing functionality
- `src/style.css` - All application styles

## Development Commands
- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run preview` - Preview production build

## Admin Credentials
Default password: `admin123` (change in `src/data.js` for production)

## Data Storage
Contact data is stored in localStorage under the key `vcard_contact_data`
